name: Bodgeball or Dodgebomb maybe?
description:
It's dodgeball with bombs!

Hit the other player with your bomb to score a point, don't leave a bomb to explode on your side or your opponent gets a point - and watch out for asteroids!

You can dash at a bomb to catch it if you aren't already holding one.

Controls

Requires two players, either two controllers or replace one with keyboard/mouse.

Mouse/KeyboardController (360 gamepad)MoveArrow keys / WASDLeft analogue stickDash (while moving)Right clickLeft bumperAimAim using cursorRight analogue stickThrow (hold to charge)Left clickRight bumper
